title: Italian Sausage Soup Recipe with Roasted Peppers and Serranos
directions: Heat a soup pot to medium heat and add sausage with serrano peppers. Stir and cook 7-8 minutes, or until sausage is mostly cooked through.
Add garlic and cook another minute, stirring.
Add the remaining ingredients and bring to a quick boil.
Reduce heat and cook about 15 minutes, until pasta is nice and soft and the flavors have developed.
Serve with Parmesan or Romano cheese!
ingredients: 1 red bell pepper, roasted and chopped
Shredded Parmesan or Romano cheese for serving
